tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE alarms_and_alerts (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  alarm_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_msg TEXT,
  created_at TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE alarms (
    alarm_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    alarm_type VARCHAR(50),
    alarm_description TEXT,
    alarm_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    alarm_id INT,
    alert_level VARCHAR(20),
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Alarms (
  alarm_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  alarm_type VARCHAR(50),
  alarm_message TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Alerts (
  alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  device_id INT,
  alert_type VARCHAR(50),
  alert_description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Incidents (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  alarm_id INT,
  alert_id INT,
  severity VARCHAR(20),
  description TEXT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alarms (
    alarm_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    alarm_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT NOT NULL,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    severity INT,
    description TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    alarm_id INT NOT NULL,
    alert_id INT NOT NULL,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    occurred_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alarms (
    device_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    alarm_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alarm_type VARCHAR,
    alarm_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    alert_type VARCHAR,
    alert_message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    incident_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    incident_type VARCHAR,
    description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    device_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    log_type VARCHAR,
    log_message TEXT
);
